Info.title: Living Flow Water Church is
Info.description:
Let him see the light of Jesus.
It gets you out of the dark.
It opens your eyes by realizing the truth.
It fills you with wisdom and ability in life.
It allows you to have the power of faith so that you can only go to Jesus.

Description.message: When you hear these words, the darkness in your mind, heart, and body leaves you, and the work of healing takes place. The more you listen to the Word, the more your eyes and your ears will open, so the treatment continues. The spiritual world opens and you realize the spiritual principles.

Location.title: Info
Location.description: Welcome! We will guide you to the way.

Introduce.name: About
Introduce.content: Teach reality and lead you to a practical life, leading you to victory with wisdom and ability in the practice of spiritual war.

Sermon.name: Sermons
Sermon.content:
You will immediately encounter your true self when you reflect on these words. 
He always wins spiritual wars because he has a different purpose in life, a different value, a clear sense of mission, and a clear desire for heaven.

Hymn.name: Hymns
Hymn.content:
Shalom! I'm greeting you in the name of the Lord.
The Holy Spirit, who makes me praise God's love and grace that has been poured into me for the past 70 years, has given me praise through my heart and lips since one day. I am putting this praise book before the Lord, praying that the Lord's healing and restoration in our lives and that the grace of the hymns in history will be in all souls.

News.name: News
News.content: We share what happens in the church.

Footer.addressDesc: 16006 53, Seonggogae-ro, Uiwang-si, Gyeonggi-do, Republic of Korea

pastor.name: Rev. Ijin Kim
pastor.overview: “It teaches reality and leads you to a practical life, leading you to victory with wisdom and ability in the practice of spiritual war.”
pastor.details:
The church where bottled water flows is a church where the spirit is beautifully made by proclaiming the true word of the Lord.
It is a church like a hospital that changes the saints who take on inner healing and resemble the image of God and move toward heaven only as the Holy Father of the Lord.

worship.name: Service
worship.details: You are a happy man. Who is the people who have gained the salvation of the Lord? - Shin Myung-ki 33:29

church.name: Introduction to the Church
church.content:
It heals your inner self and changes your life.
It leads you to the right path of faith.
Life tells you the way to solve problems, and it also solves them.
As your spiritual eyes open, you first see yourself and have a desire to go only with faith.
You realize God's will toward you and you fulfill your mission.
I love God with all my heart.
As the purpose of life changes, values change, and a sense of mission becomes clear, heaven's wishes become clear, and he always wins spiritual wars.
